member.name: SFVM_HELPTOPIC_DATA
member.summary: Contains the name of an HTML Help file and a topic in that file. Used with the SFVM_GETHELPTOPIC notification. This structure requires Unicode strings.

member.name: SFVM_HELPTOPIC_DATA.wszHelpFile
member.summary: A null-terminated Unicode string containing the fully qualified path to the help file.

member.name: SFVM_HELPTOPIC_DATA.wszHelpTopic
member.summary: A null-terminated Unicode string containing the name of the topic.
